Name: Dorothy Parker
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Light, fruity and easy to drink.
History: Named after the renowned wit and drinker, we discovered this drink in 2007 at Town Hall, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Dorothy Parker contains 161 calories
